transcript: Thank God I realized what you are, if I would never marry you again, ever in my life. You're cruel, fiend, and I hate you, you're beans! You're beans, they hate you, dumbass, dumbass!

segments.text: Thank God I realized what you are, if I would never marry you again, ever in my life.
You're cruel, fiend, and I hate you, you're beans!
You're beans, they hate you, dumbass, dumbass!

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: Thank God I realized what you are-- I'd never marry you again ever in my life. You're a cruel fiend and I hate you. You're a beast. You're a beast--I hate you. Stop it.  Stop it.
